> I created 3 use cases here:
>
> http://www.cs.odu.edu/~fmccown/heritrix/use_cases.html

Hello again,

So I have filled out the red bits in case #1 and case #2, but I'm not  
sure what you're asking in case #3 -- "How could the rule be applied  
*after* getting the URL?"  Can you maybe clarify your question for  
me?  (A better way to handle the requirement of only handling .html  
files might be to look for the content-type of text/html as in case  
#2, but I like that case #3 tries a different approach.)

Also, I suppose I should properly introduce myself.  I just joined  
the Heritrix team over here at the archive, so you'll be seeing me on  
this group a lot.  Answering the questions posed in your document was  
a good thing for me to do, as it broadens my knowledge of the system  
as well.

Thanks again,

-Paul
